title: Manager#assign died
body:
Seeing this periodically with 1.0.0:

```
2012-04-16T20:46:08Z 390 TID-395nk INFO: Received USR1, no longer accepting new work
2012-04-16T20:46:08Z 390 TID-395nk INFO: Shutting down
2012-04-16T20:46:49Z 390 TID-ogljk INFO: Shutting down 25 quiet workers
2012-04-16T20:46:49Z 390 TID-ogljk INFO: Shutting down 0 quiet workers
2012-04-16T20:46:50Z 390 TID-ogljk ERROR: Manager#assign died
2012-04-16T20:46:50Z 390 TID-ogljk ERROR: undefined method `process!' for nil:NilClass
2012-04-16T20:46:50Z 390 TID-ogljk ERROR: /mnt/vm-production/current/vendor/bundle/ruby/1.9.1/bundler/gems/sidekiq-cb6a191bca18/lib/sidekiq/manager.rb:103:in `block in assign'
/mnt/vm-production/current/vendor/bundle/ruby/1.9.1/bundler/gems/sidekiq-cb6a191bca18/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:42:in `watchdog'
/mnt/vm-production/current/vendor/bundle/ruby/1.9.1/bundler/gems/sidekiq-cb6a191bca18/lib/sidekiq/manager.rb:99:in `assign'
/mnt/vm-production/current/vendor/bundle/ruby/1.9.1/gems/celluloid-0.10.0/lib/celluloid/calls.rb:98:in `dispatch'
/mnt/vm-production/current/vendor/bundle/ruby/1.9.1/gems/celluloid-0.10.0/lib/celluloid/actor.rb:212:in `block in handle_message'
/mnt/vm-production/current/vendor/bundle/ruby/1.9.1/gems/celluloid-0.10.0/lib/celluloid/task.rb:45:in `block in initialize'
Sidekiq shut down gracefully.
```

Can't figure out what triggers it, anyone else seen this?
